item.title: Beauty and the Sage
item.description: “So last night I was watching a movie. The storyline was conventional, ‘boy rescues the girl from grave dangers’. After the movie ended, I realized something. Throughout the movie, all my focus was on the girl. Her beauty captured all my attention and at that moment of admiration, I imagined myself as the hero character who can give up all his hopes and dreams to be her rescuer”, said the boy to the sage.

item.title: Changes are Inevitable
item.description: No doubt, changes are inevitable. The person who resists the changes that are for his/her good is no better than a dead person. I had to make a change.
